text: Egypt has been a partner of the United States over the last 30 years, has been instrumental in keeping the peace in the Middle East between Egypt and Israel, which is a critical accomplishment that has meant so much to so many people.
author: Hillary Clinton

text: The need for peace in Northern Ireland goes well beyond political stability. It now speaks to regional Europe and even global stability.
author: Hillary Clinton

text: We will stand up for our friends in the world. And one of the most important friends is the State of Israel. My administration will be steadfast in support Israel against terrorism and violence, and in seeking the peace for which all Israelis pray.
author: George W. Bush

text: If in our daily life we can smile, if we can be peaceful and happy, not only we, but everyone will profit from it. This is the most basic kind of peace work.
author: Nhat Hanh

text: Love has its place, as does hate. Peace has its place, as does war. Mercy has its place, as do cruelty and revenge.
author: Meir Kahane
